articles.author: Lucia Newman
articles.title: Puerto Williams: A journey to the end of the world
articles.description: The globe’s southernmost town is hoping to become a hub for biocultural and environmental education.
articles.content: With the exception of a couple of nearby Chilean islands with just a handful of people, the southernmost populated town on our planet is Puerto Williams, Chile. It is located on the island of Navarin… [+8203 chars]

articles.title: Higher education fled this American small town. It left behind 'a ghost town.'
articles.description: Small towns across America grow to count on the colleges and universities in their communities. But when schools choose to leave, what's left behind?
articles.content:
MONTGOMERY, West Virginia When West Virginia University took the local campus out of Montgomery five years ago, it took more from the rural town than just a college.

articles.title: Aged care visa changes ‘ripe for rorting’
articles.description: Visa changes designed to boost the aged care work force could trigger a new wave of dodgy courses and low-quality students, say immigration and education experts.
